title: The Microlink Road Map serves as your Road guide to the numerous features of the Map Microlink service, showing you what is available and where to go for more information

container-title: Write: Control Data Corporation PLATO Microlink Customer Service P.O
note: in Minnesota and Hawaii) (800) 328-7104 (in all other states) Hotline hours: 7 a.m. to 7 p.m. (CST) Monday through Friday 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. (CST) Saturday
title: Any time you have a question about the PLATO Microlink service, you have several sources of help. Notes: Leave a note in the general notes file "Discussion of This PLATO Service" (mcdn) to exchange information with other users. You may also leave a note in the notes file "Microlink HELP Notes" (pmlhelp) to obtain help from Microlink Customer Service. See Electronic Mail for procedure
